dict.acceptation: 应该〔不问人称，表示义务，责任〕；大概是，有可能；将会；

sent.orig: All particulars should be carefully checked and verified; nothing should be taken for granted.
sent.trans: 所有细节都应仔细核实，任何事都不能想当然。

sent.orig: It's better to go back and make a net than to stand by the pond and long for fish.; Better return home and make a net than long for fish by the waterside.; It's better to go back and make a net than to covet the fish by merely staring into the water -- one should have a down-to-earth style of work to attain one's goal.; One should take practical steps to achieve one's aims.
sent.trans: 临渊羡鱼，莫如退而结网。

sent.orig: One should never intend to do harm to others, but should always guard against the harm others might do to him.
sent.trans: 害人之心不可有，防人之心不可无。

sent.orig: Strategically we should despise all our enemies, but tactically we should take them all seriously.
sent.trans: 在战略上我们要藐视一切敌人，在战术上我们要重视一切敌人。

sent.orig: We should not insult them, take away their personal effects or try to exact recantations from them, but without exception should treat them sincerely and kindly.
sent.trans: 不加侮辱，不搜财物，不要自首，一律以诚恳和气的态度对待之。
